title: 1987년 Griffiths 사건

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Donald Griffiths
**판결일**: 1987-09-30
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 133 A.D.2d 541

## 판결문 요약


unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s application to withdraw granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from judgment of Erie County Court, Forma, J.—attempted burglary, second degree, and assault, second degree.) Present—Denman, J. P., Green, Balio, Lawton and Davis, JJ.
...
